title: Broadcaster || Documents - Mobile Functionality
custom_steps:
As a Broadcaster, I want to be able to view Documents from my phone, so I can reference important documents on the go.

Zeplin: https://app.zeplin.io/project/5a0f1d4f4dcff4ca30221618/screen/6706b19333ba322efbb78f5a 

1. Mobile wireframe implemented.
2. Clicking/tapping the Filter icon opens a list of filters.
a. Year
b. Season
c. Team.
d. Network

3. Typing into the Search Bar surfaces line items with document names and/or tags that match inputted keywords.
4. Clicking/tapping a document opens the attachment in the app.
5. Clicking/tapping the "Download" button downloads the document to your device.

title: Broadcaster || Documents - Mobile Layout
custom_steps:
As a Broadcaster, I want to be able to view Documents from my phone, so I can reference important documents on the go.

Zeplin: https://app.zeplin.io/project/5a0f1d4f4dcff4ca30221618/screen/6706b19333ba322efbb78f5a


1. Mobile wireframe implemented.
2. Filter icon appears in the header, next to _Commercial Formats & Documents_ title.
3. Search Bar appears at the top of the page.
4. Documents appear in list.
5. Download button to the left of the _document name_.

6. Document tags display below _document name_
a. Grey box with _tag name_ in black.

title: Broadcaster || Documents - Desktop Commercial Formats & Documents Layout
custom_steps:
As a Broadcaster, I want to view necessary documents, so that I can access rules, forms, and anything else I may need to broadcast a game.

Zeplin Link: https://app.zeplin.io/project/5a0f1d4f4dcff4ca30221618/screen/66df3175ceed3d000862bcee 



1. Implement Desktop wireframe.

2. Documents Table added
a. Columns show as:  File, Tags
b. Documents Table top rail displays filters for
* Year filter
* Season filter
* Team filter
* Network filter
* Search bar

c. "Download" button displays as the leftmost icon in a line item.

* Document count displays as _x files_ where x is count.

title: Broadcaster || Documents - Desktop Commercial Formats & Documents Functionality
custom_steps:
As a Broadcaster, I want to view and download necessary documents, so that I can access rules, forms, and anything else I may need to broadcast a game.

Zeplin Link: https://app.zeplin.io/project/5a0f1d4f4dcff4ca30221618/screen/6706b193093febe709f7a7d8 


1. Implement Desktop wireframes.
2. Filters display information in the Documents table that match the user's selected values.
a. Year dropdown defaults current year. (Format YYYY)
b. Team dropdown defaults All Teams. - Dropdown displays all teams - User can select multiple teams to filter by.
c. Season Multi-select dropdown defaults to the current season. (Postseason, Regular Season, Spring Training)
d. Network multiselect dropdown defaults All Networks - Drop-down displays all networks
e. Search defaults empty - accepts Freeform text - surfaces line items with matching keywords - does not reset any top or left rail filter that has a non-default value selected - results match against file and tag columns
f. Clicking/tapping a column header sorts the table by that column.
* Clicking/tapping the column again will sort the Requests table the opposite way.
* Orange icon display in direction of filter sort.
* Defaults Ascending.

3. Table has vertical scroll

title: All IGSP || Documents - Update Color Scheme of Tags
custom_steps:
1. Wireframes are implemented.

2. Anywhere tags display in the documents table the following color scheme is followed:
a. Season tags display blue.
b. Org tags display gray. 
c. Broadcaster tags display yellow. 

![](index.php?/attachments/get/14851932)

title: Documents - (mobile) - When attempting to delete a document, show Delete button first, then Cancel.
custom_steps:
When deleting document(s) from the Documents page, we show the Delete button, and then Cancel when viewing the page on desktop or iPad, but phone size shows Cancel first, then Delete.  We should change that as well to keep it consistent. 

![](index.php?/attachments/get/14851933)

title: Rights Holder || Documents - Remove Download Icon if Table is Empty
custom_steps:
ISSUE
* Download icon displays when no documents have been uploaded to the documents table.
![](index.php?/attachments/get/14851934)


EXPECTED
* Download icon only displays when a document from the documents table can be downloaded (ie when there is at least one line item in the table).
![](index.php?/attachments/get/14851935)

title: Documents - Filters don't return results if more than 1 filter is applied
custom_steps:
When filtering the Documents (International), if you use a single filter, the results return as expected.  
However, if you use a combination of filters, no results return.

Expected: 
Using more than one filter does not break documents table, and returns expected results.

title: Documents - After deleting documents, Selected count still includes deleted documents
custom_steps:
If I select or or more documents and delete them, the selected items count to the left of â€œedit tagsâ€� still registers the deleted documents, even when nothing is selected.  Once a delete occurs, the counts should reflect the correct number of docs selected (if any are selected) or a total count of docs (if none are selected)

!Delete Documents- Count issue.mp4|width=1898,height=804,alt="Delete Documents- Count issue.mp4"!

title: Admin || Documents - Edit Tags Functionality
custom_steps:
As a Broadcaster, I want to edit the tags on documents, so that I can organize them as needed.

Zeplin Link: https://app.zeplin.io/project/5a0f1d4f4dcff4ca30221618/screen/6706b193017d984fe5ebb75b

*AC*
1. Implement Desktop wireframe.
2. Clicking/tapping "Edit Tags" triggers the _Tag Documents_ module.
     a. Each selected document displays in a one column table at the top of the module.
     b. If more than five documents are selected, table has vertical scroll.
     c. Clicking/tapping the Season multi-select dropdown displays:

* Regular Season
* Postseason
* Spring Training

d. Clicking/tapping the Team multi-select dropdown displays the club abbreviations of all 30 clubs.
e. Clicking/tapping the Network multi-select dropdown displays all Networks found in the Broadcast Source table.
f. Clicking/tapping "Save"

* Assigns tag values to all selected documents.
* Triggers the Saved pop up message.  "__ Docs Updated" where __ is the number of document selected.
* Displays the saved tags in the _Tags_ column of the Documents table.

g. Clicking/tapping "Cancel" and/or "X" closes the module and does not save any inputted information.

title: Admin || Documents - Desktop Commercial Formats & Documents Functionality
custom_steps:
As a Broadcaster, I want to edit and upload necessary documents, so that I can access rules, forms, and anything else I may need to broadcast a game.

Zeplin Link: https://app.zeplin.io/project/5a0f1d4f4dcff4ca30221618/screen/6706b193017d984fe5ebb75b 


*AC*

# Implement Desktop wireframe.
# Documents Table added.
1. Clicking/tapping on column headers sorts the the table by the values in that columns.
a. Defaults Ascending.
b. Clicking/tapping a second time switches the order to Descending.
c. When sorted, orange triangle icon displays pointing in the direction of the sort order.

2. Clicking/tapping on the below multi-select dropdowns filters the table for the selected value.
a. Year filter
b. Season filter
c. Team filter
d. Network filter

3. Typing into the Search bar searches the File column and returns matching results.

# Clicking/tapping "Add Documents" button triggers the computer's file selection window.
a. Selected documents in the pop up are uploaded to BATTER when user clicks/taps the CTA button.

# Dragging and dropping a file into the "Drop files here to add documents" bar uploads the document to BATTER.
a. Triggers the _Tag Documents_ module.

# Clicking/tapping a checkbox selects that line item.
# "Delete" button defaults grayed out.
a. "Delete" is enabled when one or more line item is selected.
b. Clicking/tapping "Delete" deletes all selected line items.

# "Edit Tags" button defaults grayed out. 
a. "Edit Tags" is enabled when one or more line item is selected.
b. Clicking/tapping "Edit Tags" triggers the _Tag Documents_ module.

title: Admin || Documents - Desktop Commercial Formats & Documents Layout
custom_steps:
As a Broadcaster, I want to view necessary documents, so that I can access rules, forms, and anything else I may need to broadcast a game.

Zeplin Link: https://app.zeplin.io/project/5a0f1d4f4dcff4ca30221618/screen/6706b193017d984fe5ebb75b 


*AC*

# Implement Desktop wireframe.
# Documents Table added.
1. Columns show as:  
a. File 
b. Tags

2. Documents Table top rail displays filters for
a. Year filter
b. Season filter
c. Team filter
d. Network filter
e. Search bar

3. Checkbox displays as the leftmost icon in a line item.
4. Trash icon displays in between checkbox and Download icon.
5. "Add Documents" button displays.
6. "Delete" button displays to right of Count and above Documents table.
7. "Edit tags" button displays to right of _delete_ and above Documents table.
8. "Drop files here to add documents" bar displays.
9. Document Count displays as _x files_ where x is count.
